message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. I would like to propose a price of $75 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $82.50.
I'm glad we're able to discuss this further, Alice. Considering your last offer, I'd like to propose a price of $78 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. Considering your proposal, I'm willing to go a bit lower. I'm now offering the product to you for $81.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a final price of $79 for the product.
Thank you for your final offer, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $79, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I'm now offering the product to you for $80.50.
Considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a price of $79.5 for the product.
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $79.5, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm now offering the product to you for $80.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Based on our discussions, I would like to propose a final price of $79.75 for the product.
